title: Why can't I sing anymore? I use to sing the hardest songs, but now I can't sing the easiest songs? How can I restore my singing ability? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simple, because you haven’t sung in a while. Too keep a good voice you need to practice constantly, train your voice, and you can’t just not sing for a long time and expect to be good like you where before. If you haven’t sung in a while that means you’ve lost your ability to sing good now because you haven’t been practicing with it. The thing about a voice is when singing you need to practice a lot, it’s not easy, and a good singing voice needs atention, you can’t just stop singing and expect it to be good like before. If you really want to restore your sining ability then practice a lot. All about practice. A tip while sining though is use your diaphragm to breath. The way you do that is breath in with your diaphragm first, then your chest, then breath out with your chest, then your diaphragm to maximize the air you have if you don’t know what a diaphragm is look it up, I don’t know either all I know is how to use it for breathing and I know air goes in and out through it and it’s somewhere around your belly button area inside of u; another thing is if you really want to restore your voice you can do it, but it’s not easy. It’s actually a lot of work and practice. Try voice lessons or practice with hard songs that are in your voice range so it doesn’t hurt your vocal chords.

Assuming there is nothing wrong in your voice ( no medical issues after consulting ENT specialist etc ) ,the following are the probable reasons for not being able to sing and the solution Its to do with your mood .Never force yourself to sing you will never get anything rightyou have to keep listening more .Impulsive singing of songs you love so much when you heard it for a short time will not give you desired outputYou may be unwell with minor issues like cold, cough, or even headache.You wont get the singing right .Let it subsideDont get intimidated by super singers or original tracks .Boost confidence and sing by learning the good elements from good singers .Hear your songs again and again in such caseYou may be tired or want to sing before you crash for the day .Not recommended .Ideally singing will be effective early morning before breakfast .You will master hardest songs easilyAlso do note singing talent is a natural GOD’s gift .I am surprised sometimes tough portions of a song come naturally when i sing so its the passion etched inside you which makes you sing any song well ALL THE BEST - HAPPY SINGING
